customer_reviews.title: Worked Great !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mirror covers because I had a bird that decided my mirrors were his perch !! And everyday he would land on my mirrors and hang out ! 2 issues with that ...he was scratching my mirrors really bad ... and second he was leaving a a very much unwanted gift all the way down my doors !! As soon as I put these covers on it ended !! Awesome product !! I'm looking forward to have them this winter to keep the snow off too !!!
customer_reviews.author: Trippitts

customer_reviews.title: Actually bought to keep birds off my car
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with birds perching on my car and "dirtying" up the side of my doors. Apparently, Robins like hanging out on the doors of cars and looking at their selves in the mirrors, all the while doing their business all down the side of your freshly washed car. These covers are good quality, easy to put on and take off, haven't faded all year, and keep the birds off. I can't speak for how well they would do in the winter with snow, which is their intended purpose, but I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
